explains: v. 装于罐头（can 的过去分词）
wordGroup: canned goods 罐头，罐头食品
canned vegetable 蔬菜罐头；罐头蔬菜
canned laughter ［俚］预先录制的笑声

sentences.en: Sugary canned drinks rot your teeth.
sentences.cn: 高糖的罐装饮料会让你得蛀牙。

sentences.en: He lived on a diet of water and canned fish.
This is more like it! Real food—not that canned muck.
sentences.cn: 这就是了！真正的食物—而不是那种罐装的垃圾食品。
